com.pddstudio.earthview

Class EarthView

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pddstudio.earthview.EarthView

  • public final class EarthView
extends java.lang.Object
    The main class to interact with the EarthView library.

    • Method Summary

      Fetches a list of random EarthViews with the given size and returns the result to the given EarthViewCallback

      • getEarthWallpapers

        public void getEarthWallpapers(int ammount,
                      EarthViewCallback earthViewCallback)
        Fetches a list of random EarthViews with the given size and returns the result to the given EarthViewCallback
        Parameters:
        ammount - - The amount of EarthViews that should be fetched
        earthViewCallback - - The interface the results will be sent to

      • getUniqueEarthWallpapers

        public void getUniqueEarthWallpapers(int ammount,
                            EarthViewCallback earthViewCallback)
        Fetches a list of random EarthViews with the given size and returns the result to the given EarthViewCallback. The difference to {#getEarthWallpapers} is that each item will be checked if it already exist or not before returning it.
        Parameters:
        ammount - - The amount of EarthViews that should be fetched
        earthViewCallback - - The interface the results will be sent to
